edu.buffalo.memlib

Class SwapReference<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.buffalo.memlib.SwapReference<T>

  • public class SwapReference<T>
extends Object
    A swappable reference to an object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static SwapReference<?> head
      Head and tail of global reference list.
      private SwapReference<?> next
      Neighbor elements in reference list.
      private Object object
      The referent or swap token.
      private SwapReference<?> prev
      Neighbor elements in reference list.
      private static SwapReference<?> tail
      Head and tail of global reference list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SwapReference()
      Create a SwapReference with a null referent.
      SwapReference(T object)
      Create a SwapReference referring to the given object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T get()
      Get the referent.
      boolean isSwappedOut()
      Returns true if the referent is swapped out.
      void set(T object)
      Set the referent.
      void swapIn()
      Bring the referent in from swap.
      void swapOut()
      Swap the referent out.
      (package private) static boolean swapOutLeastUsed()
      Swap out the least recently used SwapReference.
      private Swap.Token<T> token()
      Returns the swap token if we're swapped out.
      private void updateAccessList()
      Call this whenever the SwapReference is accessed or changed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • object

        private Object object
        The referent or swap token. This will either be a SwapToken object, or something else (including null).

      • next

        private SwapReference<?> next
        Neighbor elements in reference list.

      • prev

        private SwapReference<?> prev
        Neighbor elements in reference list.

      • head

        private static SwapReference<?> head
        Head and tail of global reference list. Head == LRU.

      • tail

        private static SwapReference<?> tail
        Head and tail of global reference list. Head == LRU.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SwapReference

        public SwapReference()
        Create a SwapReference with a null referent.

      • SwapReference

        public SwapReference(T object)
        Create a SwapReference referring to the given object.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public T get()
        Get the referent. If it is swapped out, it will be swapped in.

      • set

        public void set(T object)
        Set the referent. If the current referent is swapped out, its swap slot will be freed.

      • swapIn

        public void swapIn()
        Bring the referent in from swap. No effect if already swapped in.

      • swapOut

        public void swapOut()
        Swap the referent out. No effect if already swapped out.

      • isSwappedOut

        public final boolean isSwappedOut()
        Returns true if the referent is swapped out.

      • token

        private Swap.Token<T> token()
        Returns the swap token if we're swapped out. It is an error to call this if the referent is not swapped out.

      • swapOutLeastUsed

        static boolean swapOutLeastUsed()
        Swap out the least recently used SwapReference. Returns true if there was something to swap out; false otherwise.

      • updateAccessList

        private void updateAccessList()
        Call this whenever the SwapReference is accessed or changed. This updates the SwapReference's position in the global reference list, or removes it if it has been swapped out (or is null).
